title: Web-Based Customized Simulation Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Building an immersive learning environment to enhance administrators/leaders' competency in responding to social situations

learning_goals: Learners can apply conflict resolution strategies among team members from diverse cultural backgrounds with 80% accuracy through VR simulations
Learners can curate and utilize at least three types of customized leadership content tailored to job characteristics using AI recommendation systems
Learners can diagnose simulation performance results and establish improvement plans through real-time feedback functionality
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
